de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin

myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs

su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po med pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /myi dmyigs pa
stong pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma

yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po med

pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs

pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa

ste/ dngos po med pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/

'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin

myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul

gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dran pa nye
bar bzhag pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/

da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed

pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /yang dag par spong ba gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa

de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang

bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis

yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
dbang po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma

yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po
myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /stobs gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa

yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin

myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams

dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul

gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa

yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed
pa de dag ni dngos po med pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul

gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
bsam gtan gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba

yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos

po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /tshad myed pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/

ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa

de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i
khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul

gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi
nus so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs

pa yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de
dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs

pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar mi

nus so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/
'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la

rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /mngon par shes pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs

pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus
so/ /ting nge 'dzin gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar

byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa de
ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /gzungs kyi sgo gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/
'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams

dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/

dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar
myi nus so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/

da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed

pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa

ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /snying rje chen po gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs

su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bco brgyad po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung

ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po
myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams

kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs

kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis

yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan

ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs
su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang

ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni
dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rang byang chub gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs
su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams
dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/

dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni/ dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar
myi nus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs

pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po

myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /myi nyam pa'i chos nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin
pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /
gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs

pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus
so/ /zhes de ltar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsngo ba dug myed pa yin te/ bdud rtsi'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs

kyi bu mo mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na de ni/ log par yongs su bsngo ba yin gyi/ yang dag par yang yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no/ /log pa'i yongs
su bsngo ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma yin te/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis myi bsngags pa'i yongs su sngo ba des ni de'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par

myi 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs

par myi 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa

nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su
rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med
pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa
rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs

par myi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs

su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang /

don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin

stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi

dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam
gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang /

rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /

smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu/ yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba des ni/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par myi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par myi 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su

smyin par ma gyur pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/ /

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis

dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ de ltar yongs su bsngos na/ yongs su bsngos pa'i rab tu 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor de

ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul

dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis ston pa ni/ rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur/ tshad myed pa bzhi thob par gyur/ gzugs
myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags
pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor de lta na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ rab ces

bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur/ dgra bcom par gyur te/ de la
rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dgra bcom par gyur pa de dag thams cad

la nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed par yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor de

ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /

bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur
te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/
mchod pa byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches

mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /

gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/
bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas / mchod par byas ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji
snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal
pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang /
nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
byas pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos
dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/

bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems cad ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror
byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang /
nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim 'gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim gror byas/ bkur bsti byas/ phu dud du byas/

mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yod byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag

thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/
rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /
yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / steng
gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang / gos dang / bsod snyoms

dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar
gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dka'o/ /bcom ldan
'das gal te bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar myi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo

bas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/

rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /mchog zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor chags pa myed pa'i

yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /

bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can no/ /de ltar sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /

sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang /

nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can no/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi

rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te/ thal mo sbyar nas dga' ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul

gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su sngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /

lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal

mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /
lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /

'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa

ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing ci nas kyang / gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar
yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su sngo ba shin tu che'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/

de nas lha'i bu rab mtshe ma mtshe ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi

byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas

kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal

mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs

mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /

ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i bu rab

dga' ldan dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /

lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi

phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis

pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myi

'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su sngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i rab 'phrul dga' 'phrul

dga'i lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi

na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /

lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /
rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang /

gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas lha'i bu dbang byed gzhan 'phrul dbang byed

kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi

na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng

ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis/ bcom ldan
'das la gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma

mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur

ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa/ dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyi

mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu

dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa/ dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /
de nas dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan

pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis

mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/ rigs

kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pa dmyigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te/ dbyangs su brjod do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan

'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag gal te stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems pa dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/
bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ tshul khrims kyi phung po 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'am/ shes rab kyi phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i

phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas rjes su yi rang bar byas la/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas kyang / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na myed pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ des 'das pa dang /

ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa dag gi/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/

nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/
yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'am/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/ rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / chags pa myed pa'i tshul dang / byed pa myed pa'i

tshul du/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa

dang / myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / chags

pa myed pa'i tshul dang / byed pa myed pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag

bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang /

bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang myi bzod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs su myed

pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ mchog ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab ces bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam

pa myed pa zhes bya'o/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi

bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa

dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byed do zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam

gyis na/ rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ ji tsam gyis na/ rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma

mchis pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag myi len myi gtong ba dang / myi rlom myi

'jum zhing dmyigs par yang ma yin/ myi dmyigs par yang ma yin la/ de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang myed/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba

yang myed/ de chos de dag la 'grib pa yang myed/ 'phel ba yang myed/ 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro ba yang myed/ phung por 'gyur ba yang myed do zhes rnam grangs de lta bus/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung

ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /rjes su

yi rang nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni dam par 'gyur te/ rjes su yi rang ba de

dag ni/ gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang / mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba 'di la

ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong

gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro ste/ rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces

bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya'o/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i

theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs

rgyas su bcas pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i/ rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang /

rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi

rang bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni gzugs so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni tshor ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'du shes so/ /rnam par

grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'du byed do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni khams rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta bu de lta bu ni skye mched rnams so/ /rnam par

grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba

ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ brtson 'gras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol

ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni nang stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni phyi stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ phyi nang stong

nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ chen po stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu

ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni thog ma dang tha

ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ chos thams

cad stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ dngos

po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu

ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /rnam par grol

ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ dbang po rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ stobs rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta
ba de lta bu ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ bsam gtan bzhi'o/ /
rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ tshad myed pa bzhi'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rnam par

thar pa brgyad do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed

pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/

gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/

so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ snying rje chen po'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta

bu ni/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ mos pa'o/ /rnam par grol

ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ nyan thos de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rang

sangs rgyas rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi

chos nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid do zhes/ de ltar chos ma chags

pa dang / ma bcings pa dang / ma grol ba dang / ma zhen pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos ma skyes pa dang / yongs su ma skyes pa dang /

ma byung ba dang / ma 'gag pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'pho ba myed pa dang / 'jig pa myed pa nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i rab bo/ /rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa dang /

mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed

cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang

ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas

pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun

dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan

thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / steng

gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ nam mtsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims ca dang / snyun kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po dang / de dag thams cad kyi rim gror
byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / de dag gi ring bsrel la nyin
mtshan du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror bya ba
dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phud dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i don du nyams su len cing / de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa byin pa dang / de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims
srung ba dang / de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bzod pa sgom pa dang / de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan la snyoms par
'jug pa dang / de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab bsgom pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bzhugs pa gang / sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa la/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi dmyigs
pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa
ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la ni bsod nams
mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang /
bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang /
rgyur yang myi bzod de/ yongs su bsngo ba de nyid rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /
gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na myed pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu lnga'o// //
de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
snang bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i mun pa
thams cad bstsal ba la rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi nang na mchog tu
bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu byang ba'i slad du bde bar bgyid pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can thams cad kyis myig lnga yongs su thob par bgyid pa la snang bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni/ sems can shul gol bar zhugs pa rnams/ mtha' las bzlogs pa'i slad du shul ston pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag
chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos thams cad skyed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rang gi mtshan
nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du ma skyes ma 'gag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen
po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos rin po che thams cad stobs pa'i slad du/ sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid
pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ thub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gro ba
dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du 'khor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dngos
po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'am byang chub sems dpa'i
theg pa 'am/ nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bas/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu ston pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas par bya'o/ /ston pa la ji ltar phyag bya ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa'o/ /
de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

'byung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo / /dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung ngo / /phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo / /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'byung ngo / /de'i phyir shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'byung ngo / /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong

pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad

stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs

kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rgyun tu

zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

'byung ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i zhu ba 'di gang las skyes/ ci'i rgyu snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
'di skad ces smras so/ /ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ yongs su bzung ba rnams ni/ thabs mkhas pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang
da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / rang sangs
rgyas dang bcas pa de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas na/ bdag gi zhu ba skyes so/ /
ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zil kyis gnon to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon to/ /ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long brgya 'am/ stong

ngam/ brgya phrag stong yang rung ste/ dmyigs bu myed par lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/ grong khyer du 'gro bar lta ga la nus/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ dmus long lta bur
gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na/ de dag la dmyigs bu med pas/ byang chub kyi lam yang skyed myi nus na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug par lta ga la

nus/ ke'u shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ yongs su zin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ myig dang ldan par gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pas yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob po/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus gang 'di skad du pha

rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob po/ /zhes smras na/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni der yang ma zad de/ pha rol tu

phyin pa lnga ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob po/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol tu

phyin pa'i mying 'thob po/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob po/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob po/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob po/ /

smras pa de ltar ma yin te/ ke'u shi ka de ni de ltar ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par myi 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par myi 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob

par myi 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par mi 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par myi 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob ste/ ke'u shi ka

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs mngon par

bsgrub pa myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /tshor ba mngon par bsgrub pa myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /'du shes
